Select Computer Dialog Box

Requires: NI Distributed System Manager (Windows)

Click the Add button on the Shared Variable Engine Time Server Configuration dialog box to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to add a computer to the Time server search order list on the Shared Variable Engine Time Server Configuration dialog box. You can enter the computer name in the Host text box or browse for the computer using the network tree in the Machines list.

This page includes the following components:

  • Machines—Lists the computers on the network that you can select to act as a time server.
  • Host—Displays the name of the computer you want to act as a time server.
